HeroSection.title: Unlock Your Potential Through Skill Sharing
HeroSection.description: Connect with a vibrant community of learners and experts. Share your skills, learn new ones, and grow together.

SuccessStoriesSection.title: Success Stories
SuccessStoriesSection.description: See how Swapoo has transformed lives by enabling skill sharing and personal growth.

card1.title: Photography Enthusiast
card1.description: Sarah, a passionate photographer, taught her skills to aspiring artists and gained new perspectives .

card2.title: Coding Mentor
card2.description: Mark, an experienced software developer, mentored beginners and enhanced his teaching.

card3.title: Yoga Instructor
card3.description: Emily, a certified yoga instructor, expanded her reach and connected with students globally.

card4.title: Painting Passion
card4.description: Layla shared her love for watercolor painting, helping beginners express themselves creatively.

card5.title: Guitar Guru
card5.description: Omar offered beginner guitar lessons to fellow learners and got free singing tips from vocalists .

card6.title: Swimming Coach
card6.description: Kareem taught swimming techniques online and received nutritional coaching in exchange.

HowWorkSection.title: How Swapoo Works
HowWorkSection.description: Our platform connects individuals eager to share their expertise with those seeking to learn. It's a community-driven exchange where skills are valued and shared freely.

card1.title: Connect with Experts
card1.description: Find skilled individuals ready to share their knowledge in various fields.

card2.title: Explore Diverse Skills
card2.description: From coding to cooking, discover a wide range of skills to learn and master.

card3.title: Collaborate and Grow
card3.description: Engage in collaborative learning experiences that foster growth and development.

LandingSection.title: Ready to Start Your Skill Sharing Journey?

about.title: About Swapoo
about.description: We are a group of passionate, freshly graduated youth who built Swapoo to support young people in gaining valuable knowledge and skills‚Äîwithout the high cost of traditional courses. In light of current economic challenges and the rising prices of learning resources, our platform was created to make learning more accessible through skill exchange. We believe everyone has something to teach and something to learn, and by connecting with each other, we can grow together‚Äîwithout financial barriers.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.text: Welcome to Swapoo! By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully.

section2.title: 2. Who Can Use Swapoo
section2.text: You must be at least 16 years old to use Swapoo. By using the platform, you confirm that the information you provide is accurate and that you are responsible for any activity under your account.

section3.title: 3. Purpose of the Platform
section3.text: Swapoo is designed to help users connect and exchange skills in a fair, respectful, and non-commercial way. We do not sell courses or take responsibility for the content of individual exchanges between users.

section4.title: 4. What‚Äôs Not Allowed
list: Use the platform for illegal or harmful purposes.
Harass, spam, or mislead other users.
Share content that is offensive, discriminatory, or false.
Impersonate others or misrepresent your skills.

section5.title: 5. Privacy and Data
section5.text: We respect your privacy. Your personal information is stored securely and is never shared with third parties without your consent. See our Privacy Policy for more details.

section6.title: 6. Changes to the Platform
section6.text: We may update or change parts of the platform at any time to improve your experience. We may also update these terms, and we‚Äôll notify you if the changes are significant.

section7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
section7.text: Swapoo is not responsible for any harm, loss, or disputes that may occur between users. You use the platform at your own risk.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.text: If you have questions about these terms, feel free to contact us:

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.text: At Swapoo, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

section2.title: 2. What Information We Collect
section2.text: We may collect your name, email, profile details, and usage behavior to improve your experience on the platform.

section3.title: 3. How We Use Your Data
section3.text: Your data is used to personalize your experience, improve our services, and communicate with you. We do not sell or share your personal data without your consent.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.text: We implement industry-standard security practices to keep your data safe. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.text: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. Contact us if you‚Äôd like to manage your data.

section6.title: 6. Contact Us
section6.text: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at skills.swap.app@gmail.com.

plans.title: Choose Your Plan
plans.subtitle: Start free or go Pro for the ultimate Skill Trade experience.
plans.free_desc: Perfect for getting started with skill trading
plans.free_learn: Select up to 2 skills to learn
plans.free_teach: Select up to 2 skills to teach
plans.free_commission: 20% Commission rate on all paid skill trades
plans.free_active: 1 active skill trade at a time
plans.pro_desc: Unlock unlimited potential with Pro features
plans.faq1_a: Yes, you can upgrade to Pro or downgrade to Free at any time. When downgrading, you'll maintain access to Pro features until the end of your current billing period.
plans.faq2_a: For Free plan users, a 20% commission is applied to any paid skill trades. For example, if you charge $50 for a session, $10 goes to platform fees. Pro users keep 100% of their earnings.
plans.faq3_q: What happens if I exceed my Free plan limits?
plans.faq3_a: You'll need to complete or cancel existing trades before starting new ones, and you won't be able to add more skills beyond your limit. Consider upgrading to Pro for unlimited access.
plans.stay_pro: You are already on Pro plan
plans.upgrade_error: An error occurred while upgrading. Please try again.
plans.downgrade_error: An error occurred while downgrading to Free plan. Please try again.
plans.already_free: You are already on Free plan

not_part_of_trade: You're not part of this trade
free_trade_limit_reached: You have reached your free trade limit. Please upgrade to Pro to continue trading.
wantsToTrade: wants to trade skills with you
profileSuccessfullyUpdated: Your profile has been successfully updated
tradeCompletedWith: successfully completed a trade with you
